TextEng: You've got a serious attitude problem.
I'm here to talk about Rolgan's trial.
I'll be going now.
Me no like you talk!
Me go now.
I'd rather mate with a dead ogre.
Text: 차라리 죽은 오우거랑 짝짓기하는 게 낫겠어.

TextEng: Forget it, you're not my type.
Sure. I'm always ready for some good lovin'!
I'd better just go now.
You ugly. Me no like.
Me want sex now!
Me go now.
Very enlightened attitude you have there.
What are your feelings about this case?
Sounds like you figure he's already guilty.
You're a disgusting, vile man.
Is there anyway I can guarantee you find Rolgan not guilty?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Here's 100 gold pieces to make sure Rolgan is acquitted.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 롤간이 무죄 판결 받게 하려고 금화 100개 줄게.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Here's 300 gold pieces to make sure Rolgan is acquitted.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 롤간이 무죄 판결 받게 하려고 금화 300개 줄게.

TextEng: Forget it, I don't trust you. I'll be going now.
Text: 관두지, 널 못 믿겠어. 이제 갈게.

TextEng: What a horrible thing to say! You're a vile, disgusting man!
Text: 끔찍한 말이네! 넌 비열하고 역겨운 인간이야!

TextEng: I'd never defend a horrible man like you!
Text: 너 같은 끔찍한 인간을 변호할 생각 없어!

TextEng: Rolgan was no murderer. He was only defending himself!
